content.title: System Name
content.description: This system is called Maven. Maven is a multi-brain cognitive architecture designed for deterministic reasoning and decision-making.

content.title: Brain Count
content.description: Maven consists of 27 specialized brains, each with distinct responsibilities. These include core brains, specialist brains, and diagnostic brains.

content.title: Deterministic Behavior Principle
content.description: Maven operates deterministically. All brains must produce the same outputs for the same inputs. This is a core principle that governs all system behavior.

content.title: Implementation Language
content.description: Maven is implemented entirely in Python. All brain implementations, domain banks, and system components use Python.
